CustomField.description: This field is optional and can be collected as part of a workflow. It is the day the regular interest rate takes effect on a variable rate account having a different/special initial or promotional rate (in other words, the date corresponding to the day after the expiration of the initial rate period for the specified account).
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The day on which the regular interest rate takes effect on a variable rate account having a different/special initial or promotional rate (i.e. the date corresponding to the day after expiration of initial rate period for the specified account).
CustomField.label: Permanent Rate Effective Date
